segments.text: Would you mind answering a few personal questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Does your present employer know that you are going to leave ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I gave her my resignation a few days ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will she let you leave your present job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why do you want to leave your present job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , there are several reasons . I don't think my present job is suitable for me . That's the first reason . Secondly , your company has a good reputation . I think it can offer me more challenging opportunities . Last , frankly speaking , I wish to get higher pay .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I appreciate you frankness . Do you know anything about our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . It's a Korea company and it was built in Beijing five years ago .
segments.speaker: S2
